docs.title: Theta Screener – Reference Documentation
docs.text:
Theta Screener is a reference MVP that demonstrates how to consume ThetaSwap public market data endpoints and present them in a token discovery and analytics dashboard.

This application runs in read-only mode. Wallet connection and swap execution are intentionally delegated to ThetaSwap via an external redirect.

These docs are unofficial and observational, created by reviewing the Theta Screener codebase to help developers understand the current MVP scope, limitations, and extension points.

docs.title: API Surface (Observed from Code Usage)
docs.text: This page documents public endpoints as observed from this repository. It is not official ThetaSwap API documentation.

docs.title: GET /swap/top-tokens
docs.text:
URL https://swap-api.thetatoken.org/swap/top-tokens

Used for - Token list population - Price, liquidity, and volume columns - Filtering tokens with non-zero liquidity

docs.title: GET /swap/top-pairs
docs.text:
URL https://swap-api.thetatoken.org/swap/top-pairs

Used for - Pair-level metadata (server-side)

Note - Endpoint exists in the backend but is not fully surfaced in the UI.

docs.title: GET /swap/pair/{pairAddress}/transactions
docs.text:
Example https://swap-api.thetatoken.org/swap/pair/{PAIR_ADDRESS}/transactions

Used for - Recent swap transaction table - Buy / Sell direction - USD value calculations

Observed behavior - Transactions appear tied to a single hardcoded pair in the current MVP.

docs.title: Wallet Metadata JSON
docs.text: https://assets.thetatoken.org/wallet-metadata/v1/data.json

docs.title: Token Logo Assets
docs.text: https://assets.thetatoken.org/tokens/{symbol}.png

docs.title: Explorer Links
docs.text: https://explorer.thetatoken.org/txs/{transactionHash}

docs.title: Rate Limits and Reliability
docs.text:
• Rate limits are not documented
  • No retry, caching, or backoff logic observed in this repo

Recommended improvements - Cache token lists - Handle 429 responses gracefully

docs.title: Token Selector Does Not Update State
docs.text:
• Selector panel opens successfully
  • Selecting a token does not update the chart or dashboard state
  • No visual feedback is shown

docs.title: Chart Uses Demo Data
docs.text:
• Chart is rendered using a TradingView demo feed
  • Data does not align with the token list or transaction table

docs.title: Transactions Tied to a Single Pair
docs.text: • Swap table appears to show activity for one market only

docs.title: No Wallet Integration in Screener
docs.text:
• No connect wallet button
  • No balance display

Expected behavior - Wallet interactions are handled externally by ThetaSwap

docs.title: What Theta Screener Is
docs.text:
Theta Screener is a lightweight analytics dashboard that surfaces: - Token lists - Price, liquidity, and volume metrics - Recent swap activity

It acts as a market discovery and routing UI, not a trading terminal.

docs.title: What Theta Screener Is Not
docs.text:
• Not an SDK
  • Not a smart contract interface
  • Not a swap executor
  • Not a wallet-integrated dApp

All swap execution happens on ThetaSwap, which this app links to externally.

docs.title: Intended Audience
docs.text:
• Developers exploring the Theta ecosystem
  • Builders looking for a reference UI for market data visualization
  • Teams looking for a starter template for analytics dashboards

docs.title: Architecture Boundary (Observed)
docs.text:
• Frontend: React-based dashboard UI
  • Data Source: ThetaSwap public APIs and token metadata assets
  • Execution: Redirect to ThetaSwap

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
• Node.js (LTS recommended)
  • npm

docs.title: Install and Run
docs.text: npm install npm run dev

docs.title: Expected Behavior
docs.text:
• Frontend runs on http://localhost:3000
  • Backend starts on port 5006
  • App loads as a read-only dashboard
  • Trade execution redirects externally to ThetaSwap

docs.title: Setup Notes
docs.text:
• Config directory warnings may appear during startup
  • Webpack middleware deprecation warnings are non-blocking
